lines.text: [Rita and Sue are in Bob's car. Bob is about to make love to Sue on the front seat. Rita is in the back, feeling rather left out of things]

[sarcastically]
I'll just watch, if it's all right?
[Bob climbs on top of Sue. Rita takes a closer look]
Jesus! It looks like a frozen sausage!
I can't help being a pakki!
Its all your fault. If you'd had sex wi' him, he wouldn't have to go elsewhere.
Keep you mouth shut!
Well, Is that you've been saying you dirty bastard?
My husband is not a dirty bastard, it's your daughter and her so-called "mate".

[Sue comes in at 2pm; her Dad is sitting there with a baseball bat]
Where the fuck have you been?
Baby sitting.
Not just till 2 o'clock in the fuckin' morning you haven't, don't lie to me lass!
I'm not, you ask me mum.
Well yer mum's a lyin' bastard an all and I'll wrap this round ya fuckin' neck!
[throws bat down]

[blows a huff]
Mum!
What?
Come and tell him!
You're a lying little shit!
Oh, I'm fucking fed up with him! What do you think yer fuckin' playing at?
You try to tell me that she's been baby sitting till this fuckin' time?
How do you know she hasn't?
Cause' there's nowt open that's how!
There is!
Night Clubs.
Well I don't fuckin' believe yer, next time I will wrap it round yer neck.
Just be careful I don't bloody wrap it round yours!
Anyway, why don't you fuck off back to bed?
I'm sleeping in here, you're sleeping on yer bloody own.
Do what yer like.
I bloody will, don't worry!
Fuck it, I'm going to bed.
Oh go on.
Aren't you going to bed?
I'm not getting in with him!
You'll not get a bleedin' job sittin' on your arse in here.
Look who's talking; you haven't done a day's work in years!
We haven't got eggs inside us. We're not ducks, y'know!
You take the rubber johnny out of the packet-...
You didn't think we thought you could put packet on, did ya?
Well, things haven't been going so good with me and the wife.
Tell us another one!
There's no way I'm workin' all week for twenty-seven pounds thirty on some bleedin' trainin' scheme.
I had to work for eighteen shilling!
That were in the days of Methusela! They were worth more then.
[to Michelle, during an argument]
When we have sex, it feels like shagging a bag of spuds - you lay there like a bit of wet rag.
I can't help being a paki!
Yes you fuckin' can. Shouldn't interfere.
Nor should you! You're always tellin' folk what they should do; you haven't done it yourself!

[trying to be dignified]
I've done some things...
You've done nowt and you've been nowt all your life!

[while ironing Bobs trousers Sue finds a packet of condoms inside his pocket]
What the bloody hell are you doin' with a packet of these?
Me and Joe were havin' a laugh with 'em in the pub. We were blowin' 'em up!
I'm sorry to tell ya but I don't believe yer.
Well go and see Joe and ask him yer self then.

[while tossing the packet at him]
Yer a lyin' bastard, you've been arsin' around again.
Don't be silly!
What's the matter, do you think I'm thick? I know you've been pissin' about.
How do you know anythin'?
Staying out 'til all hours in the morning and making stupid excuses!
So what?
I bet it was that dirty little bitch you was screwing before. The trouble with you Bob is you're sex mad.
Ah don't be daft woman.
